Package it.unipr.netsec.mjcoap.coap.message

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CoapMessage
    CoapMessage is a CoAP message as defined in the IETF RFC 7252 "Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP)".
    CoapMessageFactory
    Collects some static methods for simplifying the creation of CoAP messages.
    CoapMessageType
    CoAP message types (CON=Confirmable (0), NON=Non-Confirmable (1), ACK=Acknowledgement (2), RST=Reset (3)).
    CoapRequest
    CoAP request message, with method for handling CoAP-specific options.
    CoapRequestMethod
    CoAP request methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE).
    CoapResponse
    CoAP response message, with method for handling CoAP-specific options.
    CoapResponseCode
    CoAP response codes.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CoapMessageFormatException
    CoapMessageFormatException.
